page.title: 02THE HALL FAMILY
page.content: 6:20am Dad gets up. 7:30am Mum gets up. Dad arrives for work at his own company. 8:00am I get up. 8:45am Mum takes Jo-Jo (the dog) out for a walk. 9:05am School starts.My subjects:- science,technical, then dinner at home then health education,social education ,french,maths then home at 4:00pm. 9:30am Mum goes out to the bank,then shops at Asda.10:10am Simon gets up. He has just finished his exams and gets the rest of the week off.11:15am Mum makes dinner.12:45pm Mum takes the dog out Simon goes to school social area then goes to his friends house. 1:45pm Mum visits grandparents. 3:30pm Mum makes tea. 5:30pm All have tea. Simon plays games on his computer. 10:45pm Simon and I go to bed.Mum and dad do business books.Dad takes Jo-Jo for a walk.Mum and Dad go to bed.
